sentences.sContent: Because the reason you freelance is for the freedom, right?
sentences.sContent_eng: Because the reason you freelance is for the freedom, right?
sentences.sCn: 你选择做自由职业者的原因就是自由，是吧？

sentences.sContent: Every once in a while I have an open hour for my freelance clients - they can give me a call about anything they like.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every once in a while I have an open hour for my freelance clients - they can give me a call about anything they like.
sentences.sCn: 作为自由职业者，每隔一段时间，我会拿出一个小时给我的客户 - 他们可以打电话给我，聊他们愿意聊的事。

sentences.sContent: Read up on business: The fact that you’re reading this blog is a good sign — you can get a ton of information about running your freelance business online.
sentences.sContent_eng: Read up on business: The fact that you’re reading this blog is a good sign — you can get a ton of information about running your freelance business online.
sentences.sCn: 研习商务：事实上，你阅读这篇博客是一个好的现象，因为从中你可以知道许多关于自由职业者如何经营自己事业的信息。

remMethod.val: free(自由) + lance(看作lines， 几行字) → 自由地写东西做事 → 当自由职业者

words.tran: 自由地；免费地；大量地；慷慨地；直率地
自由保有；[会计] 不动产所有权
自由民；享有市民权的人；荣誉市民
使自由；解放（free的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: working independently for different companies rather than being employed by one particular company
